sourcesContent:
Product Name : {{product_name}}

Product Price : {{product_price}}

Total Quantity : {{quantity}}

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-sigle-product', templateUrl: './sigle-product.component.html', styleUrls: ['./sigle-product.component.scss'] }) export class SigleProductComponent { product_name = "Dell Laptop"; product_price = "$1000"; quantity = 0; sale = "false"; add(){ this.quantity += 1; } minus(){ this.quantity += -1; } }
